title: James McAvoy 'secretly marries' Lisa Liberati three years after he split from wife
text:

James McAvoy has secretly married his girlfriend of three years according to pals.

James got together with production assistant Lisa Liberati on the set of Split in Philadelphia in America.

Shameless actor James, 40, was in the process of splitting from wife of 11 years Anne-Marie Duff.

According to the Mail Online close pal director Jamie Lloyd, who is a close friend of the Glasgow-born actor, said he believes the pair wed in private.

(Image: Alamy Stock Photo)

Sources said: "He was overheard at actor David Suchet's party in London last week describing how Lisa visits him often during rehearsals.

"He went on to refer to Lisa as James's 'wife' and said they married 'recently'."

(Image: Vantagenews.com)

(Image: X01981)

James split with wife Anne Marie, whom he met while filming Shameless, in 2016.

The pair have continued to be friends. And stayed together with son Brendan in their £1.9 million four-bed terraced house in north London after the split.

Mirror Online has contacted James for comment.
description: X-Men star James married his 40-year-old girlfriend in secret according to reports
